intent_atoms.description: Expose MP4RA category strings through the catalog so streaming parse events can surface human-readable metadata groupings.
Addition of category metadata to BoxDescriptor is additive and defaults to nil when absent, ensuring backward compatibility.

functional_units.name: BoxDescriptor Category Metadata
functional_units.description: Adds an optional 'category' field to BoxDescriptor objects for MP4RA category strings

functional_units.name: MP4RACatalogRefresher Integration
functional_units.description: Updates the catalog loader and refresher pipelines to populate the new category property in descriptors
